CommitComments.CommitComment: Striker is now working properly again. FollowBall is improved, and the transition to StatePointToGoal is smoother.
Freezing bug fixed, hopefully. Still too much overcompensation in StateFollowBall.
COMPETITON VERSION OF CODE. REVERT POINT
dual debug/non-debug function working. Robots will start state machine differently based on their names.
Fix debug problems before setting up button to run autonomously
Fix IR seeker math exception by replacing sqrt loop approximation with real Math square root
Enable running without bluetooth. Choose position playing based on brick name.
